body_html:
Just wanted to remind you guys that it's been a while and CUDA 9.1 still isn't supported, even by the nightly build.

This means I still can't use TensorFlow because my system requires CUDA 9.1 for another purpose. I hope this can be fixed soon.

body:
Just wanted to remind you guys that it's been a while and CUDA 9.1 still isn't supported, even by the nightly build.

This means I still can't use TensorFlow because my system requires CUDA 9.1 for another purpose. I hope this can be fixed soon.
